explains: v. 抹去，擦掉；删除；忘却；消除，消灭；（易）被擦掉，（易）被抹去

sentences.en: They are desperate to erase the memory of that last defeat.
sentences.cn: 他们急于抹去上次失败的记忆。

sentences.en: You can erase pencil marks with a rubber.
sentences.cn: 你可以用橡皮擦掉铅笔记号。

sentences.en: He tried to erase the idea from his mind.
sentences.cn: 他试图从头脑中抹掉这个想法。
